page.title: 06EDUCATION St.Cuthbert's P.S.
page.content: Our school is in{Parkfield,Stockton} near Parkfield Foundry.In Sep. of this year,1985,Mrs.M.Thatcher,the Prime Minister,visited this foundry during her tour of the N.E.Because of the precautions that had to be taken we got the afternoon off school.We celebrated our centenary this year. Here are some entries of the sch.log book:Oct.3,1884-"New books,easel, varied occupations,etc.arrived this week.Infants delighted with new "Illustrated Spelling Sheets." Obliged to reprove Martha Cane(Monitor) for not using her energy...Rev Manager and another gentleman visited."{Nov.21st. {1884:}"Attendance not quite so good owing to{"Hirings"}and poverty.Gave a lesson in counting to 1st.Class Infants for benefit of Monitors.Taught a new song.Our school is now in a new building,opened in 1971.
